meanings.definition: Any of various plants of the genus Stellaria, especially Stellaria holostea, having small white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The stitchwort in the garden has delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bunch of stitchwort for a floral arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The stitchwort decided to wear a tiny hat made of petals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like stitchwort in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The stitchwort's beauty captivated all who passed by.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Stellaria.
meanings.sent1: Look at the stitchwort growing near the fence.
meanings.sent2: The stitchwort is a common sight in meadows.
meanings.sent3: The stitchwort challenged the daisy to a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a garden where stitchwort of memories bloomed.
meanings.sent5: The stitchwort swayed gently in the breeze, a picture of grace.

meanings.definition: Any of various plants of the genus Stellaria, especially Stellaria holostea.
meanings.sent1: The forest floor was carpeted with stitchwort.
meanings.sent2: Stitchwort is known for its dainty appearance.
meanings.sent3: The stitchwort whispered secrets to the ferns.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, he saw fields of stitchwort stretching endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The stitchwort danced in the sunlight, a fairy in the garden.
